title: payment terminals
extract: A payment terminal, also known as a Point of Sale (POS) terminal, credit card terminal, EFTPOS terminal (or by the older term as PDQ terminal which stands for "Process Data Quickly" or in common jargon as "Pretty Damn Quick"), is a device which interfaces with payment cards to make electronic funds transfers.
extract_html: A payment terminal, also known as a Point of Sale (POS) terminal, credit card terminal, EFTPOS terminal (or by the older term as PDQ terminal which stands for "Process Data Quickly" or in common jargon as "Pretty Damn Quick"), is a device which interfaces with payment cards to make electronic funds transfers.
